= Taskwarrior =

Taskwarrior is a command line tool manager. At the core, taskwarrior is a task list processing system. But more 
Powerful: due dates, priorities, tags, projects etc. 

1. Add task 
   
   $ task add Do this thing 

= Installation =

Use package manager to install it. 
	
	 $ dnf install task(fedora)
	 $ apt-get install taskwarrior (Ubuntu, Debian)
	 $ zypper install taskwarrior (OpenSUSE)
	 $ pacman -S task (Arch)
	 $ sbopkg -i task (Slackware)
	 $ emerge task (Gentoo)
	 $ brew install task (Mac OS X, Homebrew)
	 $ apt-get install task (Windows 10, Bash on Ubuntu)
